/icons/databases/10123-icon-service-Azur.name: Azure Database MariaDB Server

/icons/databases/10131-icon-service-Azur.description: A fully managed, relational database service based on the popular PostgreSQL RDBMS for hosting various PostgreSQL-based workloads.
